available.description: __Read-only__ A list of services _available_ to your account in the `region`.

region.description: __Read-only__ The Akamai cloud computing data center (region), represented by a slug value. You can view a full list of regions and their associated slugs with the [List regions](https://techdocs.akamai.com/linode-api/reference/get-regions) operation.

unavailable.description: __Read-only__ A list of services _unavailable_ to your account in the `region`.
